description: This vegetarian noodles recipe combines the rich Japanese flavours of teriyaki with umami mushrooms and crunchy sweet sugar snap peas. Quick and easy, you can whip up this meal in just 10 minutes.
name: Teriyaki Mushrooms & Noodles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide the noodles and sugar snap peas between 4 bowls and spoon the mushrooms and sauce over the top.
